original_text: For every tree is known by his own fruit. For of thorns men do not gather figs, nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes.
korean_text: 나무는 각각 그 열매로 아나니 가시나무에서 무화과를, 또는 찔레에서 포도를 따지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: For every tree is known by his own fruit.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 각 나무가 그 열매로 알려지기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: For of thorns men do not gather figs,
nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes.
